INSERT INTO tb_song
singer_id, name, album, duration, style, cover_url, audio_url, release_time,
#{singerId}, #{name}, #{album}, #{duration}, #{style}, #{coverUrl}, #{audioUrl}, #{releaseTime},
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tb_song WHERE name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')

SELECT s.id as id, s.singer_id as singerId, si.singer_name as singerName, s.name as name, s.album, s.duration, s.style, s.cover_url as coverUrl, s.audio_url as audioUrl, s.release_time as releaseTime FROM tb_song s LEFT JOIN tb_singer si ON s.singer_id = si.id WHERE s.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')

SELECT s.id as id, s.singer_id as singerId, si.singer_name as singerName, s.name as name, s.album, s.duration, s.style, s.cover_url as coverUrl, s.audio_url as audioUrl, s.release_time as releaseTime FROM tb_song s LEFT JOIN tb_singer si ON s.singer_id = si.id WHERE s.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{songName}, '%') ORDER BY s.id DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}

SELECT s.id as id, s.singer_id as singerId, si.singer_name as singerName, s.name as name, s.album, s.duration, s.style, s.cover_url as coverUrl, s.audio_url as audioUrl, s.release_time as releaseTime FROM tb_song s LEFT JOIN tb_singer si ON s.singer_id = si.id ORDER BY s.id DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_song WHERE name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{songName}, '%')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_song WHERE style = #{style}

SELECT s.id as id, s.singer_id as singerId, si.singer_name as singerName, s.name as name, s.album, s.duration, s.style, s.cover_url as coverUrl, s.audio_url as audioUrl, s.release_time as releaseTime FROM tb_song s LEFT JOIN tb_singer si ON s.singer_id = si.id WHERE s.style = #{style} ORDER BY s.id DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
